title: Ukraine Wants Military Support to Deter Russia While the U.S. Weighs Response
sub_head: Ukrainian officials say efforts to stop Moscow would be strengthened if Biden administration steps up assistance ahead of an attack
body:
When Ukraineâ€™s defense minister visited his U.S. counterpart at the Pentagon last month, he delivered a wish-list of assistance to defend his country against the threat of Russian troops massing near its borders. At the top were high-tech antimissile systems, Ukrainian and U.S. officials close to the situation said.
A month later, the White House said it is still considering that request.
